EmailTemplate.name: CS Tech TRL Case Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval rejected for the new TRL Case: {!Case.CaseNumber} : "{!Case.Subject}"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.CreatedBy},
The Case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been rejected with the following comments: {!ApprovalRequest.Comments}.
Click here to access the case in Salesforce.
Thanks.
